text: @marklevinshow The covid-19 pandemic started in 2019. The issue has always been taking hydroxchloroquine in response to Coronavirus- not taking it for FDA approved reasons! Your stupidity is embarrassing and pathetic. Not to mention sharing this is illegal and immoral. I mean, wow, you're DUMB.

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
